mapper.select: SELECT ssts.scnrio_num AS scnrio_num , ssts.scnrio_nm AS scnrio_nm , ssts.scnrio_desc AS scnrio_desc FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS rownum , ssts.scnrio_num AS scnrio_num , ssts.scnrio_nm AS scnrio_nm , ssts.scnrio_desc AS scnrio_desc FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) r WHERE NOW() BETWEEN ssts.eff_sta_dtm AND ssts.eff_end_dtm AND (#{sch_txt} = NULL OR ssts.scnrio_nm LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', IFNULL(#{sch_txt}, '')), '%')) ORDER BY scnrio_num ) ssts WHERE #{page_num} IS NULL OR #{page_num} = 0 OR (ssts.rownum <= IFNULL(#{page_num}, 1) * 40 AND ssts.rownum >= (IFNULL(#{page_num}, 1) - 1) * 40 + 1 )
SELECT ssts.src_cd AS src_cd FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts WHERE ssts.scnrio_num = #{scnrio_num} AND NOW() BETWEEN ssts.eff_sta_dtm AND ssts.eff_end_dtm

SELECT sstc.case_num AS case_num , sstc.case_nm AS case_nm , sstc.case_desc AS case_desc FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts , skd_sel_test_case sstc WHERE ssts.scnrio_num = #{scnrio_num} AND NOW() BETWEEN ssts.eff_sta_dtm AND ssts.eff_end_dtm AND ssts.scnrio_num = sstc.scnrio_num AND NOW() BETWEEN sstc.eff_sta_dtm AND sstc.eff_end_dtm ORDER BY sstc.seq_num

SELECT ssti.input_num AS input_num , ssti.input_nm AS input_nm , (SELECT sstci.input_val FROM skd_sel_test_case_input sstci WHERE sstci.scnrio_num = ssts.scnrio_num AND sstci.case_num = sstc.case_num AND sstci.input_num = ssti.input_num AND NOW() BETWEEN sstci.eff_sta_dtm AND sstci.eff_end_dtm ) AS input_val FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts , skd_sel_test_case sstc , skd_sel_test_input ssti WHERE ssts.scnrio_num = #{scnrio_num} AND NOW() BETWEEN ssts.eff_sta_dtm AND ssts.eff_end_dtm AND ssts.scnrio_num = sstc.scnrio_num AND sstc.case_num = #{case_num} AND NOW() BETWEEN sstc.eff_sta_dtm AND sstc.eff_end_dtm AND ssti.scnrio_num = ssts.scnrio_num AND NOW() BETWEEN ssti.eff_sta_dtm AND ssti.eff_end_dtm ORDER BY ssti.input_num

SELECT sster.test_step_num AS test_step_num , sster.rslt_strd AS rslt_strd , sster.judg_typ_cd AS judg_typ_cd , (SELECT ccd.cd_seq_name FROM cmn_cd_spc ccs , cmn_cd_dtl ccd WHERE ccs.cd_num = 34 AND NOW() BETWEEN ccs.eff_sta_dtm AND ccs.eff_end_dtm AND ccs.cd_num = ccd.cd_num AND ccd.cd_seq = sster.judg_typ_cd AND NOW() BETWEEN ccd.eff_sta_dtm AND ccd.eff_end_dtm ) AS judg_typ_nm FROM skd_sel_test_expt_rslt sster , skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts , skd_sel_test_case sstc WHERE ssts.scnrio_num = #{scnrio_num} AND NOW() BETWEEN sster.eff_sta_dtm AND sster.eff_end_dtm AND sstc.scnrio_num = ssts.scnrio_num AND sstc.case_num = #{case_num} AND NOW() BETWEEN sstc.eff_sta_dtm AND sstc.eff_end_dtm AND sster.scnrio_num = ssts.scnrio_num AND sster.case_num = sstc.case_num AND NOW() BETWEEN sster.eff_sta_dtm AND sster.eff_end_dtm ORDER BY sster.test_step_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO skd_sel_test_scnrio ( scnrio_num , eff_end_dtm , audit_num , audit_dtm , scnrio_nm , op_typ_num , scnrio_desc , seq_num , src_cd , eff_sta_dtm ) SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ssts.scnrio_num + 1), 1) AS scnrio_num , '9999-12-31 23:59:59' AS eff_end_dtm , #{user_num} AS audit_num , NOW() AS audit_dtm , #{scnrio_nm} AS scnrio_nm , CASE WHEN #{op_typ_num} IS NULL THEN (SELECT scot.op_typ_num FROM skd_cmn_user_op_typ scuot , skd_cmn_op_typ scot WHERE NOW() BETWEEN scot.eff_sta_dtm AND scot.eff_end_dtm AND scuot.user_num = #{user_num} AND scuot.op_typ_num = scot.op_typ_num AND NOW() BETWEEN scuot.eff_sta_dtm AND scuot.eff_end_dtm AND scuot.rep_yn = 'Y' ) ELSE #{op_typ_num} END AS op_typ_num , #{scnrio_desc} AS scnrio_desc , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ssts2.seq_num + 1), 1) AS seq_num FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts2 ) AS seq_num , '' AS src_cd , #{system_call_dtm} AS eff_sta_dtm FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts WHERE ssts.scnrio_nm = #{scnrio_nm} AND NOW() BETWEEN ssts.eff_sta_dtm AND ssts.eff_end_dtm ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS is_exist_yn
SELECT MAX(ssts.scnrio_num) AS scnrio_num FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts WHERE ssts.scnrio_nm = #{scnrio_nm} AND NOW() BETWEEN ssts.eff_sta_dtm AND ssts.eff_end_dtm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO skd_sel_test_case ( scnrio_num , case_num , eff_end_dtm , audit_num , audit_dtm , case_nm , case_desc , seq_num , eff_sta_dtm ) SELECT #{scnrio_num} AS scnrio_num , IFNULL(MAX(sstc.case_num + 1), 1) AS case_num , '9999-12-31 23:59:59' AS eff_end_dtm , #{user_num} AS audit_num , NOW() AS audit_dtm , #{case_nm} AS case_nm , #{case_desc} AS case_desc , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(sstc2.seq_num + 1), 1) AS seq_num FROM skd_sel_test_case sstc2 WHERE sstc2.scnrio_num = sstc.scnrio_num ) AS seq_num , #{system_call_dtm} AS eff_sta_dtm FROM skd_sel_test_case sstc
mapper.update: UPDATE skd_sel_test_scnrio SET eff_end_dtm = NOW() - INTERVAL 1 SECOND , audit_num = #{user_num} , audit_dtm = NOW() WHERE NOW() BETWEEN eff_sta_dtm AND eff_end_dtm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO skd_sel_test_case_input ( scnrio_num , case_num , input_num , eff_end_dtm , audit_num , audit_dtm , input_val , eff_sta_dtm ) SELECT sstci1.scnrio_num AS scnrio_num , sstci1.case_num AS case_num , #{input_num} AS input_num , '9999-12-31 23:59:59' AS eff_end_dtm , #{user_num} AS audit_num , NOW() AS audit_dtm , sstci1.input_val AS input_val , #{system_call_dtm} AS eff_sta_dtm FROM skd_sel_test_input ssti1 , skd_sel_test_case_input sstci1 WHERE ssti1.scnrio_num = #{scnrio_num} AND ssti1.input_nm = #{input_nm} AND ssti1.eff_end_dtm = (SELECT MAX(ssti2.eff_end_dtm) FROM skd_sel_test_input ssti2 WHERE ssti2.scnrio_num = ssti1.scnrio_num AND ssti2.input_nm = ssti1.input_nm ) AND sstci1.scnrio_num = ssti1.scnrio_num AND sstci1.input_num = ssti1.input_num AND ssti1.eff_end_dtm BETWEEN sstci1.eff_sta_dtm AND sstci1.eff_end_dtm

INSERT INTO skd_sel_test_scnrio ( scnrio_num , eff_end_dtm , audit_num , audit_dtm , scnrio_nm , op_typ_num , scnrio_desc , seq_num , src_cd , eff_sta_dtm ) SELECT ssts.scnrio_num AS scnrio_num , '9999-12-31 23:59:59' AS eff_end_dtm , #{user_num} AS audit_num , NOW() AS audit_dtm , ssts.scnrio_nm AS scnrio_nm , ssts.op_typ_num AS op_typ_num , ssts.scnrio_desc AS scnrio_desc , seq_num AS seq_num , #{src_cd} AS src_cd , #{system_call_dtm} AS eff_sta_dtm FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts WHERE ssts.scnrio_num = #{scnrio_num} AND ssts.eff_end_dtm = (SELECT MAX(eff_end_dtm) FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts2 WHERE ssts2.scnrio_num = ssts.scnrio_num )
